about_the_game:
Antbox is a short sandbox game about observing ants.

Ants leave the nest in search of food to bring home. They leave pheremone trails to help others find their way to discovered food and to alert others that danger is near.

You can customize the ants' abilities and behavior to your liking.

Challenges to the ants' survival include food scarcity, predators, and rival ant colonies. Customize rivals and see which colony performs the best.
detailed_description:
Antbox is a short sandbox game about observing ants.

Ants leave the nest in search of food to bring home. They leave pheremone trails to help others find their way to discovered food and to alert others that danger is near.

You can customize the ants' abilities and behavior to your liking.

Challenges to the ants' survival include food scarcity, predators, and rival ant colonies. Customize rivals and see which colony performs the best.
name: Antbox

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: x86_32 CPU with SSE2 instructions, any x86_64 CPU, ARMv8 CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics with full Vulkan 1.0 support
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: x86_64 CPU with SSE4.2 instructions, with 4 physical cores or more, ARMv8 CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics with full Vulkan 1.2 support
  • Storage: 150 MB available space

short_description: Customize your own ant colony. Test its viability against starvation and predation. Pit rival colonies against each other and see who comes out on top. Do you like to watch ants go about their day?
